attributes.action: Dissolve this base and corrupt parliament and let the people elect a new parliament and restore the nation and it's people to God's grace.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Immediatley dissolve parliament, call an election and remove all MPs who have substantially gained from the expences debacle.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
